title: How to Clean Paint Brushes and Rollers (So You Can Actually Reuse Them)
description: When you finish up painting a room, piece of furniture, or other project, the last thing you want to do is clean up the mess you’ve made. But if you’ve invested in decent-quality paint brushes and rollers, you probably want to use them more than once. And taking a few minutes to clean them right away will save you a…

title: The Difference Between a Buyer's Market and a Seller's Market (and How to Take Advantage of Both)
description: Knowing when to buy or sell a house is tricky. Sure, particular periods of time are labeled either a “buyer’s market” or a “seller’s market,” but aside from making a broad statement about who has the upper hand, what do these terms actually mean? And what should you do if you’re a buyer in a seller’s market, or vice…
